title: OT118: Threadgorian Calendar
summary:
Key Ideas:
- The blog post is part of an open thread for readers to discuss anything they want
- Comment of the week is by someone who doubts the authenticity of Jeanne Calment's supercentenarian status
- Raymond Arnold is running a crowdfunding campaign to release an album featuring his Solstice songs
- The Report Comment button only works on the encrypted https protocol, not on http
- The author provides updates on ads for GiveDirectly and Charity Entrepreneurship, both focused on helping needy people and starting non-profits respectively
- Readers are encouraged to participate in a survey conducted by SSC and a supplemental survey by user RavenclawPrefect 
- The author wishes readers a happy new year 

Key Learnings:
- The blog post provides a summary of the latest news and updates for the SSC blog, including charity ads and surveys
- Readers can participate in open threads to discuss anything that interests them
- There are opportunities to support charities and learn more about starting non-profits 

Key Questions:
- How can the Report Comment button be made to work on both http and https protocols?
